Team Working Project

This is a deep dive into the team working module and assessment for university

Description

This project is the most highly valued module of this course, after the honours project ofcource. This module allowed me to work as a team with multiple disciplines (Programming, audio, production, art etc) to create a game for a client (for us it was HyperLuminal Games in dundee) following a client brief.
